meta.content:
Governor Kim Reynolds and the Iowa Department of Education announced yesterday that all public-school districts and nonpublic schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year, and will continue to offer continuous learning to support mitigation efforts of the spread of COVID-19. This also includes the cancellation of spring sports activities.
While the...

form.p: Sign up for the News Update.

li.a: Northwood-Kensett, St. Ansgar school districts to share superintendent next year
Dropping off and picking up students

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

p.style: font: 400 14px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
p.span: Governor Kim Reynolds and the Iowa Department of Education announced yesterday

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: that all public-school districts and nonpublic schools will be closed for the remainder of

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: the 2019-20 school year, and will continue to offer continuous learning to support

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: mitigation efforts of the spread of COVID-19. This also includes the cancellation of

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: spring sports activities.

p.style: font: 400 17px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 20px;

font: 400 14px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
p.span: While the Governor’s decision may bring disappointment, protecting the safety of our

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: students and employees is first and foremost. The Governor’s announcement brings

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: more decisions for the Northwood-Kensett school district to be made in the coming

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: weeks. The school district will continue to operate in a voluntary continuous learning

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: system through April 30, 2020, as the board has already decided. The board of

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: education, with a recommendation from the administration, will decide whether to stay in

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: the voluntary continuous learning plan, or proceed to a required continuous learning

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: plan through the remainder of the scheduled school year. The district will also decide on

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: how to determine grades and credit for students for the current semester. Details with

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: specifications for activities like prom, graduation and driver’s education will be coming

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: soon to those families.

p.style: font: 400 17px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 20px;

font: 400 14px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
p.span: Ann Lebo, the Director of the Department of Education, stated in the press conference

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: on Friday, April 17, 2020, that a decision regarding the summer sports of baseball and

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 17px; line-height: normal; font-kerning: none;

p.span: softball will be made in May.

p.style: font: 400 17px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 20px;

font: 400 14px Georgia; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: rgb(21, 23, 25); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
p.span: Michael R. Crozier, Superintendent

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

p.span: © 2020 Northwood-Kensett

p.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
